title: "Responsibilities"

Team members have different responsibilities, as summarized below.

## All

- Review [security](/management/security.html)
- Familiarize with and consider our [standard operating principles (SOP)](/management/sop.html) (Using issues for tasks, along with the [overview of GitHub Issues](https://github.com/issues/assigned){target=_blank})
- Meet with Gerit on a regular basis (every 1-2 weeks)
- To set a meeting, check the other's calendar and send a calendar invitation via email
- Use the [planning sessions](https://fs-ise.github.io/handbook/docs/00.goals.html#annual-cadence){target=_blank} to discuss and document objectives and key results (OKR) in your [agenda repository](/management/agendas.html){target=_blank}

::: resource 
Our [agenda repositories](/management/agendas.html){target=_blank} on GitHub are [here](https://github.com/orgs/fs-ise/repositories?q=topic%3Aagenda){target=_blank}.
:::

## Team assistant

Our team assistant manages the processes in the management section.

Notes:

- Monitoring of deadlines:
  - FlexNow (grades, planning of modules, changes in modules) , LUFV, exam supervision, ... 
  - List of deadlines UnivIS: [SoSe2026](https://vc.uni-bamberg.de/pluginfile.php/2939703/mod_resource/content/1/Terminplanung%20Sommersemester%202026.pdf){target=_blank}
  - [List of current and upcoming courses](/teaching/new_course.html)
  
- Preparation and postprocessing of exams, register "sham participants", order exam paper at in-house print shop (Mr. Stephan Hoh), provide necessary documents for exam supervisors, check corrected exams regarding points, find professor for second correction, enter grades in FlexNow, send exam papers back to examination office

::: {.callout-note title="Optional future tasks" collapse=true}
- Reimbursement of expenses (e.g. licenses, case studies, which were paid with own credit card)
- External lectureship management (application at deanery, arrangement of lecture dates, room booking, transponder organizing, support with remuneration)
- Support with organising excursions 
- Appointment management for professor
- Application for and settlement of study grants
- [Recording of publications in FIS](/research/publication.html)
:::
